education.area: Master in Science and Engineering: Game and Software Engineering

publications.name: Using Artificial Intelligence for Gameplay Testing On Turn-Based Games
publications.summary: My Master's thesis, co-written with Joakim Ståhle-Nilsson. Using Monte-Carlo Tree Search, we attempt to playtest a turn-based game – then in-development at Fall Damage Studio – to identify optimal strategies and bugs at an early stage.
